review: Works pretty well.  We use it when traveling to watch Netflix.  It can be occasionally glitchy which is why it only gets 4 stars.
author: John J. Cooper

review: I cancelled my cable TV, now I only pay for the internet and watch netflix or popcorn time, even youtube using my android phone. Easy Peasy
author: Amazon Customer

review: Came in time and it works great!
